text: Whenever I think about modern technology, I'm always so fascinated of how it actually works. I grew up surrounded by it actually, thus I honestly don't exactly know how everything was before. I got used to it. The world as we know it now will probably never going to be as it was in the past. Is that a good thing? I don't have the answer to that, however I'm glad technology exists. It has its flaws indeed but if we give a special interest to all the advantages it brings to us, I'm sure everyone would agree. It linked the entire world by creating thousand and thousand of connections over the whole globe. It has succeeded to bring us closer, more thoughtful of what happens throughout the world by allowing us to get an easy access to informations. I find it quite amazing. Except, all the beneficial aspects of social media and technology can only be seen if they are well-used. Most of the time, sadly, they aren't. Therefore they are quite impressive and socially interesting but they must be used with a lot of precautions. Especially when it comes to politics. Whenever a political campaign is happening, social media automatically get involved. By spreading false informations through their user's adds for example, they lead them to a certain way of thinking. Which not only impacts the political- decisions making of the voters but also undermines the entire elections. There is a lot of things to consider when it comes to technology. I chose to point at the positive aspect of it at first, but there are so much more to talk about.
